emails.subject: Reset your CapTracks account password
text:
You are receiving this because you (or someone else) requested to reset the password for your CapTracks account. 
Please use the following link (valid for the next 60 minutes) to complete the process: 

http://
If you did not make this request, please ignore this email, and your password will remain unchanged.

emails.name: join_customer
emails.subject: Welcome to CapTracks!
text:
Welcome to CapTracks! 

We are so glad you joined the CapTracks ecosystem. 

If you haven't had a chance already, take a look at your new store page:

Your page is where you'll be able to 
- Update your store's currecnt capacity 
- Post informatio to your forum 
- Add useful links for your customers (like a link to your store's weekly deals) 
- And update your store's information 

Be sure to bookmark your account page to access it easily. 

Please note that CapTracks is still a work in progress. We hope you won't run into any issues with the site, but if you do, please help us out by emailing a screenshot of the error along with a few words describing the problem to rena@captracks.com. 

If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please contact us at info@captracks.com. 

Thank you for joining the CapTracks community! We look forward to working with you!

- Team CapTracks
